attributes.action: set -up a trust fund for black people of slave decendents to become self reliant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be some kind of help equal to the Jews after the Holocost. For no one race has suffered more than the Black human race at the hand of so many others.
    this fund will assist black slave decendents to return back to Africa and be self reliant. To benifit, one must be of the black human race and in a British Ex-Colony or the U.K. and be  more than 100 years out of africa . know where they wish to go in Africa with a Qualified skill or proof of a successful bussiness experience. this should be funded by all those institutions and organizations, which have benifited from this inhumian HORROR.
